publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3911 Ross Finnie: The Draft Road Traffic (Vehicle Emissions) (Fixed Penalty) (Scotland) Regulations 2003-That the Transport and the Environment Committee, in consideration of the draft Road Traffic (Vehicle Emissions) (Fixed Penalty) (Scotland) Regulations 2003, recommend that the Regulation be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson*

S1M-3911 Ross Finnie: The Draft Road Traffic (Vehicle Emissions) (Fixed Penalty) (Scotland) Regulations 2003-That the Transport and the Environment Committee, in consideration of the draft Road Traffic (Vehicle Emissions) (Fixed Penalty) (Scotland) Regulations 2003, recommend that the Regulation be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson
